title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2603.2 - Application submission requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2603.2 - Application submission requirements

State Regulations
(a) The applicant must complete such forms
and attachments as prescribed by the division. (b) Essential components of the application
include: (1)
documentation supporting the
eligibility of both the applicant and the neighborhood; (2)
general goals in effecting neighborhood
preservation, stabilization or improvement; (3)
quantified, measurable objectives to be
accomplished by the completion of the activities proposed in the work
plan; (4)
budget, specifying the
use of funds requested from the division and other financial resources, including the one-third match requirement and staffing pattern; and
(5)
documentation of community
support. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2603.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
